title: How to debug DNS Request Flows in Kubernetes Clusters with Inspektor Gadget, CoreDNS plugin or Hubble
author: Qasim Sarfraz Software Engineer
description: In this blog, you will learn about the tools that you can use to debug DNS Request Flows in Kubernetes Clusters. This blog will also cover the different debugging scenarios and how to fix each of them.
cntitle: 使用 Inspektor Gadget、CoreDNS 插件或 Hubble 调试 Kubernetes 集群中的 DNS 请求流程
cndescription: 本文将介绍用于调试 Kubernetes 集群中 DNS 请求流程的工具。本文还将涵盖不同的调试场景以及如何修复每个场景。
